results.content:
- REST API of server part not really RESTful - should not contain function names in URL, but entity adressing
- Explanation of security concept poor, login should not use GET method.
Good for a basic overview, not for secure final implementation.

response.content: Appreciated. All of them will be implemented.
response.content_html: Appreciated. All of them will be implemented.
